name: The Gorgovore
description:
Inspired by the Slayers RPG.

You know what they say about the process of fighting monsters and gazing into the abyss n' such? Well, heck with that.

This is more like "you are what you eat."

And you eat MONSTERS!

This custom class focuses on gaining dice from devouring the essence of monsters and spending it on cool stuff.

You also do slowly turn into a monster, which is why there's a bonus monster! The Amalgabeast.

Also an advancement for Tacticians with Gorgovores in their party.

And a Custom Sheet.

Making a custom class was fun and maybe you should try making stuff for it to. Especially since there's a jam for it now.

Thank you!
